snippet: One of the three members of the punk protest band said she wanted to fire her lawyers because of disagreements, and an appellate court pushed the hearing back to Oct. 10.
abstract: Moscow appellate court postpones hearing for punk protest band Pussy Riot after one of three defendants says she wants to fire her lawyers because of disagreements.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth and Anna Kordunsky contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: One of the three members of the punk protest band said she wanted to fire her lawyers because of disagreements, and an appellate court pushed the hearing back to Oct. 10.

headline.seo: Pussy Riot Hearing Is Postponed by Moscow Court
headline.main: Moscow Court Postpones Pussy Riot Hearing
